actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to authorize the use of appropriated funds to pay the compensation of Vietnamese refugees who may be employed by the United States.

summary.text: Refugee Reeemployment Act - Provides that Vietnamese, Cambodian, or Laotian refugees formerly employed by an agency of the United States in their respective countries for a period of not less than 3 years may be employed by the United States Government and compensated with appropriated funds.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the use of appropriated funds to pay the compensation of Vietnamese refugees who may be employed by the United States.
